item.title: Cookie Policy
item.description: Cookies Policy of PREMIURLY OÜ What are cookies? Cookies are a small text files that are stored in your web browser that allows Premiurly or a third party to recognize you.

item.title: PRIVACY NOTICE
item.description: Premiurly OÜ (“Premiurly”, “we”, “us”) collects, uses, and handles your personal information when you use our products like Polkassembly.
